fields.name: items
fields.label: Items
fields.hint: Contains comma-separated list used for generating options available in following list field.

fields.name: stringList
fields.label: String List
fields.hint: Controls label of all items in list at bottom of form.

fields.name: prompt
fields.label: Prompt
fields.hint: Controls prompt displayed used in list below.

fields.name: itemA
fields.label: Item A
fields.hint: Controls value of first option in list below.

fields.name: itemB
fields.label: Item B
fields.hint: Controls value of second option in list below.

fields.name: itemC
fields.label: Item C
fields.hint: Controls value of third option in list below.

fields.name: optionsList
fields.label: Options List
fields.hint: When selecting option in string-controlled list above every option of this list should have equivalent label.
